// Custom imports
import axios from'axios';// Global variables
axios.defaults.baseURL='https://thawing-lowlands-03153.herokuapp.com';export var PERSONAL_INFO='PERSONAL_INFO';export var ABILITIES='ABILITIES';export var SKILLS='SKILLS';export var EVENTS='EVENTS';export var PENDING_FALSE='PENDING_FALSE';function SetPersonalInfo(personalInfo){return{type:PERSONAL_INFO,personalInfo:personalInfo};}function SetAbilities(abilities){return{type:ABILITIES,abilities:abilities};}function SetSkills(skills){return{type:SKILLS,skills:skills};}function SetEvents(events){return{type:EVENTS,events:events};}function SetPendingFalse(){return{type:PENDING_FALSE};}export function GetPersonalInfo(){return function(dispatch){// Get data from wagtail cms here
return axios.get('/api/v2/pages/?type=personalinfo.personalinfo&fields=*').then(function(data){dispatch(SetPersonalInfo(data.data.items[0]));dispatch(GetAbilities());dispatch(GetSkills());dispatch(GetEvents());}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};}export function GetAbilities(){return function(dispatch){// Get data from wagtail cms here
return axios.get('/api/v2/pages/?type=abilities.Abilities&fields=*').then(function(data){dispatch(SetAbilities(data.data.items));}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};}export function GetSkills(){return function(dispatch){// Get data from wagtail cms here
return axios.get('/api/v2/pages/?type=skills.skills&fields=*').then(function(data){dispatch(SetSkills(data.data.items));}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};}export function GetEvents(){return function(dispatch){// Get data from wagtail cms here
return axios.get('/api/v2/pages/?type=events.events&fields=*&order=-id').then(function(data){dispatch(SetEvents(data.data.items));dispatch(SetPendingFalse());}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};}
